item.title: About
item.description: About team T3rm1n4l3n We are former classmates and friends from Security and Cloud Computing programme at Aalto University. We started taking parts in CTFs since 2020. In addition to that, we take part in hackathons and solve the challenges together in THM and HTB. Previously we were called “Common”, and sometimes had other names. Members of the team Akzharkyn Duisembiyeva Plant-lover and traveller Linkedin Github __ /\ .
item.content:
About team T3rm1n4l3n

We are former classmates and friends from Security and Cloud Computing programme at Aalto University. We started taking parts in CTFs since 2020. In addition to that, we take part in hackathons and solve the challenges together in THM and HTB. Previously we were called “Common”, and sometimes had other names.

Members of the team

Akzharkyn Duisembiyeva

  • Plant-lover and traveller
  • Linkedin Github

item.title: Hello Friend
item.description: Hello, dear friends. We are a team of friends and security enthusiasts that take part in various CTFs, hackathons or any other competitions. Our primary goal is to learn and teach each other, and we believe that working in a team of like-minded people is a perfect way to achieve our goals. In this page, we will collect our posts related to events, place our writeups and share our tips and tricks.
item.content: Hello, dear friends. We are a team of friends and security enthusiasts that take part in various CTFs, hackathons or any other competitions. Our primary goal is to learn and teach each other, and we believe that working in a team of like-minded people is a perfect way to achieve our goals. In this page, we will collect our posts related to events, place our writeups and share our tips and tricks.

item.title: Showcase
item.description: CTFs 5G Cybersecurity Hackathon, June 18-20, 2021 - 1 place in “I bet you can’t get in” challenge by Cisco Capture The Flag With Datadog & HackTheBox at RSA, May 21, 2021 - Fastest solution FOI CTF, September 2020 - 18th place out of 152 teams Hackathons Junction, November 15-17, 2019 in Espoo, Finland - honourable mention in the track “Smooth travels” by Qoco
item.content:
CTFs

  • 5G Cybersecurity Hackathon, June 18-20, 2021 - 1 place in “I bet you can’t get in” challenge by Cisco
  • Capture The Flag With Datadog & HackTheBox at RSA, May 21, 2021 - Fastest solution
  • FOI CTF, September 2020 - 18th place out of 152 teams

Hackathons

  • Junction, November 15-17, 2019 in Espoo, Finland - honourable mention in the track “Smooth travels” by Qoco
